revised_title: On the Simultaneous Distribution of Heat and Synthermal Lines
tldr: This article discusses the distribution of temperature in the atmosphere, soil, and ocean, focusing on the concept of synthermal lines. The author proposes using synthermal lines to represent places with the same temperature at a specific time, and presents tables and maps to demonstrate the distribution of these lines. The author also explores the relationship between synthermal lines and soil temperature, as well as the connection to wind force.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Climate Science
